concept.title: Users and Roles
concept.shortdesc: The provides several roles and a default user account based on each role. For increased security, update the passwords for these accounts or create additional user accounts. A production deployment of the should integrate with intranet authentication such as LDAP.

conbody.p: usersdefault users and rolesrolesfor users roles define the tasks that a user can perform. When you configure a user, assign the user one or more roles. Users can perform any task that their roles allow.
You can create additional users for increased security. A production deployment of the should integrate with intranet authentication such as LDAP.

The provides the following roles:
admin Allows you to perform any task within the . As an admin, you can configure pipelines and alerts, start and stop pipelines, view snapshots, and start or stop the . The login for the admin user account is admin/admin.
manager Allows you to manage pipelines. As a manager, you can start and stop pipelines, monitor pipelines, configure and reset alerts, and view snapshots. You cannot configure pipelines or perform data preview. The login for the manager user account is manager/manager.
creator Allows you to configure pipelines. As a creator, you can configure pipelines and alerts, perform data preview, and monitor the pipeline. You cannot view snapshots or reset alerts. The login for the creator user account is creator/creator.
guest Allows read-only access to areas of the . As a guest, you can view pipeline and alert configuration, view general monitoring and log information. You cannot view data preview or snapshots, or configure pipelines or alerts. The login for the guest user account is guest/guest.
